definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut off or away, a plant (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּסַח]], ksay (for Heb. [[זׇמַר]]); Ar. kasah.a sweep off, away, destroy, do away with; cf. Sab. [[כסח]] overpower, conquer, Hom:ZMG 1892, 532)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass., fs. [[כְּסוּחָה]] Ps 80:17, cut away, of Isr. under fig. of vine; mpl. [[קוֹחִים כְּסוּחִים]] Is 33:12 thorns cut away, fig. of peoples destroyed by divine judgment.
